text: The Venture is very simple it's a tomato
paste Manufacturing Company in Nigeria
and I came up with the idea actually
when I lived in Nigeria back in 2008 and
I saw basically miles and miles of
tomato fields and tomatoes just rotting
everywhere and when I asked what was
happening people said there's just a lot
of postmarket loss and post Harvest loss
the tomatoes don't get to the market and
there's no way to capture them so the
farmers are losing out and Nigerian
consumers are losing out because they're
not able to buy a local product it was
intense but I think it was a very
iterative process for us but it really
made us think about the business model
and putting the farmers at the center
off that business model and making it
then a consumer Centric product that's
going to be proudly Nigerian the HPS
network has been hugely valuable to us
also our classmates just helping us
practice our pitching helping us to you
know get connected to other people that
they know of who might be able to help
us I mean my heart was racing uh I've
never done anything like this before or
pitched before um never really stood up
in front of that many hundreds of people
before so uh it was all just pretty
thrilling we're going to spend hopefully
uh June and July well June working in
the iLab and then get out to Nigeria for
July and half of August um to start
working with our partners on the ground
to identify the sites and figure out how
do we actually get boots on the ground
so we're moving full steam ahead and
we're really excited about it
